attributes.additional_details:
We want immigration rules changed to include:
No entry into the UK without employment already secured.
Savings of at least £10,000 to enter the country.
No free schooling for at least 3 years.
No free medical care for immigrants who have not contributed to the system for at least 3 years.
No benefits of any kind for at least 3 years.
No council housing for at least 3 years.
Immediate deportation if convicted of any offence and a permanent ban.
It is time to put an end to the free loaders who drain our services and put the UK tax payers first.
